original: de la rnam par snang mdzad dub dag nyid phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab ces pa ni tshon rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de la rnam par snang mdzad dub dag nyid phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab ces pa ni tshon rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i tshe /
translated: There, one should consecrate the colors with the seal of Vairocana means that when one consecrates the colors,

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas slob dpon nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis rlobs shig ces pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas slob dpon nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis rlobs shig ces pa ste /
translated: one should consecrate oneself as the body of Vairocana with the vajra seal.

original: rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan mas na ye shes lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan mas na ye shes lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i don to //
translated: The vajra is the sign of wisdom, so it means consecrated by the five wisdoms.

original: tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yang /
analyzed: tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yang /
translated: The consecration of the colors

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: is twofold: conventional and ultimate.

original: de la don dam par byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la don dam par byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For the sake of the ultimate consecration, it is said,

original: chos thams cad kyi dbyings rgya chen pos byin gyis brlabs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbyings rgya chen pos byin gyis brlabs zhes pa'o //
translated: consecrated by the vast realm of all phenomena.

original: de ni tshon sna lnga'i sbyor /
analyzed: de ni tshon sna lnga'i sbyor /
translated: That is the application of the five colors.

original: chos kyi dbyings chen po stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab ces pa'i don to //🔽kun rdzob kyi sgo nas tshon re re zhing yang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings chen po stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab ces pa'i don to // kun rdzob kyi sgo nas tshon re re zhing yang /
translated: The meaning is that one consecrates the great realm of reality as emptiness.

original: lha re res byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa /🔽tshon ni dang po blangs nas su //
analyzed: lha re res byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa / tshon ni dang po blangs nas su //
translated: From the point of view of the conventional, it is said that each color is consecrated by each deity.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The consecration] is taught beginning with “Having first taken up the color,” and so on.

original: de tshon dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab par gsungs te /
analyzed: de tshon dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab par gsungs te /
translated: The white color is said to be consecrated as the realm of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings de'i rang bzhin dang mthu bstan par gsungs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings de'i rang bzhin dang mthu bstan par gsungs pa /
translated: The nature and power of the realm of reality are taught:

original: chos kyi dbyings dag pa sems can gyi khams sbyong ba po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de dag ste zhes pa thams cad yang ba zhes so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dag pa sems can gyi khams sbyong ba po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de dag ste zhes pa thams cad yang ba zhes so //
translated: “The pure realm of reality is the purifying of the realm of sentient beings, the tathāgatas themselves.”

original: chos kyi dbyings de lta bu'i don du bsam nas don de yi ge ra 'bar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan smod pa de lta bus byin gyis brlab bo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings de lta bu'i don du bsam nas don de yi ge ra 'bar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan smod pa de lta bus byin gyis brlab bo //
translated: Having contemplated the meaning of the realm of reality in that way, one consecrates the blazing ra and so on with the qualities of that meaning.

original: de nas tshon dmar po byin gyis brlabs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas tshon dmar po byin gyis brlabs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Then the consecration of the red color is taught:

original: de nas gnyis dang dmar po'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas gnyis dang dmar po'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, “two and red” and so forth.

original: yi ge ma'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas mi thul bas byin gyis brlabs par gsungs so //🔽de nas tshon ser po la yi ge'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa /
analyzed: yi ge ma'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas mi thul bas byin gyis brlabs par gsungs so // de nas tshon ser po la yi ge'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa /
translated: It is said that the seed syllable of the letter ma generates the Buddha Akṣobhya, who consecrates the blue color.🔽Then, the seed syllable of the letter ra generates the Buddha Kāśyapa,

original: sangs rgyas gser thub kyis byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa /🔽de nas / gsum pa'i tshon de blangs nas su //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gser thub kyis byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa / de nas / gsum pa'i tshon de blangs nas su //
translated: who consecrates the yellow color.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, “having taken the color of the third” and so forth.

original: tshon ljang gu la snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa'i skus byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshon ljang gu la snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa'i skus byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that the Buddha Ratnasambhava, who resides in the heart of enlightenment, consecrates the green color.

original: de nas margad ces pa'i kha dog la sogs pa'i tshon ljang gu'i kha dog ni nor bu margad 'dra ba'i kha dog lta bu'o //
analyzed: de nas margad ces pa'i kha dog la sogs pa'i tshon ljang gu'i kha dog ni nor bu margad 'dra ba'i kha dog lta bu'o //
translated: Then, “emerald” and so forth. The color of the green color is like the color of an emerald jewel.

original: tshon nag po khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa /🔽@186b de nas nag po blangs nas su //
analyzed: tshon nag po khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs par gsungs pa / @186b de nas nag po blangs nas su //
translated: It is said that the Buddha Vairocana, who resides in the center of the peak of Mount Meru, consecrates the black color.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, “having taken the black” and so forth.

original: de la yi ge lngas bskyed pa'i khro bo'i gzugs de yang ji 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: de la yi ge lngas bskyed pa'i khro bo'i gzugs de yang ji 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is the form of the wrathful one generated by the five seed syllables like?

original: rnam par g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i phreng ba dus mtha'i me'i mtha' lta bu 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i phreng ba dus mtha'i me'i mtha' lta bu 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is terrifying, with a garland of blazing flames like the end of the eon fire.

original: de la tshon sna lnga rnams ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du blta ste /
analyzed: de la tshon sna lnga rnams ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du blta ste /
translated: With regard to that, the five colors are to be seen as the nature of the five pristine wisdoms.

original: dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: White is the nature of the realm of phenomena.

original: dmar po ni thul bar dka' ba sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin te me long lta bu'o //
analyzed: dmar po ni thul bar dka' ba sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin te me long lta bu'o //
translated: Red is the nature of the Buddha difficult to subdue, which is the mirror-like one.

original: ser po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
analyzed: ser po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
translated: Yellow is the wisdom of equality.

original: ljang gu ni kun du rtog pa'i ye shes /
analyzed: ljang gu ni kun du rtog pa'i ye shes /
translated: Green is the wisdom of discernment.

original: nag po ni bya ba nan gyi ye shes /
analyzed: nag po ni bya ba nan gyi ye shes /
translated: Black is the wisdom of successful activity.

original: de la rim par bshad pa ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings nyid du dang po nas 'jug go //
analyzed: de la rim par bshad pa ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings nyid du dang po nas 'jug go //
translated: The explanation in order is that one enters into the realm of phenomena of all phenomena from the beginning.
